title: Episode 305: Pho
description: On an all new episode of Eat Your Words, host Cathy Erway speaks with Andrea Nguyen, author of The Pho Cookbook: Easy to Adventurous Recipes for Vietnam's Favorite Soup and Noodles﻿. Andrea dives deep into pho’s lively past, visiting its birthplace and then teaching you how to successfully make it at home.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
